short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit alteration-action relationships to the Molecular Oncology Almanac from Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help us keep precision cancer medicine up to date!

Precision oncology rests on a scientific knowledge base that is constantly evolving. This extension helps keep that knowledge base of findings updated to the latest research.

When a new precision oncology finding is reported in the literature, this extension enables you to quickly submit any reported alteration to the Molecular Oncology Almanac, an open-source knowledge system and interpretation algorithm for cancer genomic data. The Molecular Oncology Almanac is developed and maintained by the Van Allen Lab at Dana-Farber Cancer Institute/Broad Institute (https://moalmanac.org/). 

All submissions will be reviewed before incorporating into the knowledge base.

Credit to Zotero for certain icons used in development.
